description:
This is a classic ice-breaker activity with a few twists.


Everyone is responsible for finding ten things that they have in common amongst all of their teammates. Remember to tell everyone easy cop-outs aren‚Äôt allowed, like ‚ÄúAll of us have two hands‚Äù. Once they find ten things they have in common, they share their discoveries with the group.


The point of this activity is to have fun conversations, spark creativity, understand ourselves and to find unique similarities between all of us.


In the end, you create a team artefact together to hang around your workplace ü§ó
